Articles.Content:
![m2gkt9Q.png](http://i.imgur.com/m2gkt9Q.png)

Hello!

This is the best plane I've ever made for KSP. She flies beautifully and never loses control.

> 
> 
> > [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/TTdIN)
> 

**Required Mods**

[BahamutoDynamics](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/101/Bahamuto_Dynamics_Parts_pack_v1.1)- Engines

[Quiztech Aero](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/111691-WIP-1-0-2-QuizTech-Aero-Pack-v1-2-8-x-Updated-6-9-15-New-Mk2-Service-Bay-and-Small-Tanks!!)- Cockpit

[Ven's stock revamp](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92764-1-0-2-Stock-Part-Revamp-Update-1-8-1!)- For everything else. May not be necessary, but I won't risk it.

**Recommended Mods**

[Kerbal Joint Reenforcement](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55657-1-0-2-Kerbal-Joint-Reinforcement-v3-1-3-4-27-15)- Might be a little floppy without it.

[**Download**](https://www./?0ydwkwh000d98ho)

Enjoy!

SmallFatFetus

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-24T21:05:36Z" title="06/24/2015 09:05  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 24, 2015</time> by SmallFatFetus**
